item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行可独立于美联储行动降低利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，无论美联储发生什么变化，欧洲中央银行的政策都将随之发展。【原文：European Central Bank policy will develop regardless of what happens at the Federal Reserve, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 谈判代表称，主要国家就大纲达成一致，COP29 协议指日可待
item.description: COP29 似乎将达成最后的协议，因为谈判代表们同意了一项关于资金的协议的大纲，将在阿塞拜疆举行的气候谈判从破裂的边缘拉了回来。【原文：COP29 appeared set for a last ditch deal as negotiators agreed the broad outline of a deal on finance, pulling the climate talks in Azerbaijan back from the brink of breaking down.】

item.title: 特朗普选择斯科特-贝森特为财政部长，是对华尔街的顺从
item.description:
最终，这场充满戏剧性的搜索以一位对冲基金高管为起点— ，他花了数月时间有条不紊地为提名打下基础。【原文：

In the end, the drama-filled search landed where it started — with a hedge fund executive who’d spent months methodically laying the groundwork for a nomination.

】

item.title: 对于押注股市反弹的华尔街专业人士来说，历史毫无用处
item.description: 在总统大选之后，股市通常会出现反弹，投资者在押注股市反弹方面面临挑战：由于 S&P 500 指数有望创下有史以来最好的一年开局之一，这次历史无法成为指南。【原文：Investors have a challenge in betting on the usual stock market rally that tends to arrive after a presidential election: With the S&P 500 Index on track for one of its best ever starts to a year, history can’t be a guide this time.】

item.title: 墨西哥以 27 亿美元扩建港口应对特朗普威胁
item.description: 墨西哥将目光投向即将上台的特朗普政府的关税威胁之外，无论其北方邻国和最大的贸易伙伴采取何种行动，墨西哥都对全球商品贸易的光明前景充满信心。【原文：Mexico is looking beyond the incoming Trump administration’s threats of tariffs, betting on a bright future for global merchandise trade no matter what actions its northern neighbor and biggest trading partner takes.】

item.title: 迪拜的房地产热潮让买家跃跃欲试
item.description: 迪拜转变为世界上最热门的房地产市场之一，越来越多的买家被挤出市场，导致人们对房地产投资信托基金的兴趣复苏，并促使许多人转向只需支付 136 美元的部分所有权应用程序。【原文：Dubai’s transformation into one of the world’s hottest property markets is increasingly pricing out buyers, leading to a revival of interest in real estate investment trusts and prompting many to turn to fractional ownership apps that require as little as $136 in payments.】

item.title: 马来西亚向中国展示如何保持 5%的增长
item.description: 中国自制定 2024 年 5%左右的经济增长目标以来，一直在推出新的经济支持措施，试图实现这一目标。对于许多国家来说，即使是那些发展水平较低、追赶潜力巨大的国家，这个目标也很难实现。【原文：China has been unveiling fresh economic-support measures to try and meet its 2024 growth target of around 5% practically since it set the goal. For many nations—even those lower on the development scale with lots of catch-up potential—that mark is hard to sustain.】

item.title: 特朗普的财政部长人选希望成为影子美联储主席，也许会导致美元疲软
item.description: 斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent），这位资深对冲基金经理被唐纳德-特朗普选为下一任财政部长。【原文：Scott Bessent, the veteran hedge fund manager who Donald Trump picked to become the next Treasury secretary, wants tariffs, a shadow chair for the Federal Reserve and maybe a weaker dollar.】

item.title: 描绘全球经济：欧洲经济前景黯淡
item.description: 欧元区的商业活动本月意外萎缩，加剧了人们对欧洲经济前景的担忧，并表明欧洲中央银行需要更加积极地削减利率。【原文：Business activity in the euro area unexpectedly shrank this month, fueling concerns about the prospects for Europe’s economy and suggesting the European Central Bank will need to be more aggressive with interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 欧洲已经面临下一场能源危机
item.description:
冬季即将来临，储气库的清空速度比往常更快，天然气价格飙升，令人回想起2022年的震荡。【原文：

With winter still approaching, storage is being emptied faster than usual and gas prices have surged, raising echoes of the 2022 shock.

】

item.title: 阿达尼将在法律审查后回应美国贿赂指控
item.description: 阿达尼集团将在详细的法律审查之后，并在获得其法律顾问的批准后，对美国提出的贿赂指控做出回应。【原文：The Adani Group will respond to bribery allegations leveled by the US after a detailed legal review and once it has secured approvals from its counsel to speak on sub-judice issues.】

item.title: 瑞士大学对中国学生采取更严格的措施
item.description: 10 月，瑞士顶级科技大学苏黎世联邦理工学院收紧了某些科技领域硕士和博士课程的招生标准。苏黎世联邦理工大学的理由是，此举符合瑞士打击国际间谍活动的法律。【原文：In October, ETH Zurich, Switzerland’s top technical university, tightened its admissions criteria for masters and PhD programs in certain science and technology fields. It justified the move as complying with Swiss laws to counter international espionage.】

item.title: 暴风雨伯特带来天气警告和旅行中断
item.description: 暴风雪 "伯特 "已经开始造成影响，大雪封路，强降雨和大风预计将进一步扰乱出行，并可能引发洪水。【原文：Storm Bert has begun to make an impact with snow closing roads and strong rains and winds expected to cause further travel disruption and potential flooding.】

item.title: 英伟达以最快速度认证三星人工智能内存
item.description: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在香港科技大学的一次活动上告诉彭博社电视台，Nvidia 正在以最快的速度认证三星的人工智能内存芯片。【原文：Nvidia is working as fast it can to certify Samsung’s AI memory chips, CEO Jensen Huang tells Bloomberg TV on the sideline of an event at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology.】

item.title: 加拿大确认首例新型麻风腮病毒变种病例，称风险很低

item.title: Nvidia 公司总裁在香港之行中敦促全球合作
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.在越来越多的人预计美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普明年重返白宫后中美关系将再度紧张之际，英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋呼吁维护全球合作。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang called for preserving global cooperation amid growing anticipation of renewed tensions between the US and China once President-elect Donald Trump returns to the White House next year.】

item.title: 安瓦尔担任马来西亚总理两周年之际，婆罗洲挑战迫在眉睫
item.description: 马来西亚最富有的州之一正试图夺取该国最大天然气储备的控制权，使执政联盟的关系复杂化，并有可能对联邦收入造成打击。【原文：One of Malaysia’s wealthiest states is trying to seize control of the nation’s biggest gas reserves, complicating relations in the ruling coalition and threatening a blow to federal revenues.】

item.title: 美国财政部部长贝森特是 "财政鹰派"：华尔街的反应
item.description: 对冲基金主管斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周五被提名为美国财政部长，这让债券投资者得以一窥即将上任的政府的全面经济议程。【原文：Hedge fund chief Scott Bessent’s Friday nomination to become the US Treasury Secretary is offering bond investors a glimpse into the incoming administration’s sweeping economic agenda after an extended search that included multiple prominent contenders.】

item.title: 马斯克因选择火箭发射而非美国证券交易委员会会议躲过制裁
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）翘掉了与美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）的会议，去观看他的一枚火箭发射，法官拒绝对他进行制裁。【原文：A judge declined to sanction Elon Musk for skipping a meeting with the US Securities and Exchange Commission to watch one of his rockets launch.】

item.title: 壳牌-科三合资公司 Raizen 考虑乙醇合作伙伴和出售 Oxxo
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西 Raizen SA 公司正在酝酿出售其第二代乙醇工厂的股份，以筹集现金用于投资，并帮助其主要股东降低债务杠杆。【原文：Brazilian company Raizen SA is mulling the sale of a stake in its second-generation ethanol plants to raise cash for investments and help its main shareholder reduce debt leverage, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普提名对冲基金主管贝森特领导美国财政部
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将提名经营宏观对冲基金 Key Square Group 的斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）担任下一任美国财政部长，为管理他誓言要在第二个任期内颁布的全面经济议程招募一位重要顾问。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump said he is nominating Scott Bessent, who runs macro hedge fund Key Square Group, as the next US Treasury Secretary, enlisting a key adviser to manage the sweeping economic agenda he has vowed to enact in a second term.】

item.title: 莱迪思半导体考虑收购英特尔的 Altera 部门
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，莱迪思半导体公司（Lattice Semiconductor Corp）正在考虑出价收购英特尔公司（Intel Corp.【原文：Lattice Semiconductor Corp. is considering making an offer for all of Intel Corp.’s Altera, people familiar with the matter said, in a twist that could complicate the chip giant’s plans to sell a minority stake in the unit.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼称监管机构不应急于遏制人工智能
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）承认人工智能带来的风险，但她警告说，监管机构也应注意不要限制有用技术的发展。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman acknowledged the risks created by artificial intelligence but warned that regulators should also be careful not to constrict the development of useful technologies.】

item.title: 挪威1.8万亿美元基金首席执行官认为罕见的政治团结是关键
item.description: 挪威首席执行官尼古拉-坦根（Nicolai Tangen）表示，挪威1.8万亿美元的主权财富基金得益于其政治主子之间罕见的共识，这与其他正在探索这一方案的国家不同。【原文：Norway’s $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund benefits from a rare consensus among its political masters, according to Chief Executive Officer Nicolai Tangen, unlike other countries which are exploring such an option.】

item.title: 美国 CLO 销售额接近 1,850 亿美元，超过历史记录
item.description: 今年已发行约 1,847 亿美元由收购贷款支持的债券，自 2018 年以来第三次创下年度发行纪录。【原文：About $184.7 billion of bonds backed by buyout loans have been issued this year, setting an annual issuance record for the third time since 2018.】

item.title: 穆迪首次上调沙特阿拉伯评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司自 2016 年首次对沙特阿拉伯进行评估以来，首次上调了该国的主权评级。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign rating was upgraded by Moody’s Ratings for the first time since the company first assessed the kingdom in 2016.】

item.title: 大选后马斯克的财富达到创纪录的 3480 亿美元
item.description: 受特斯拉公司股票持续上涨以及其人工智能初创公司 xAI 新一轮融资估值达 500 亿美元的推动，埃隆-马斯克的净资产在上周五创下了 3,478 亿美元的历史新高。【原文：Elon Musk’s net worth hit an all-time high of $347.8 billion on Friday, driven by Tesla Inc.’s ongoing stock rally and a new funding round valuing his artificial intelligence startup xAI at $50 billion.】

item.title: 赌徒将数十亿资金投入杠杆市场边缘
item.description: 在久经考验的股票和企业信贷领域，迎接唐纳德-特朗普当选的 "买一切 "狂热正在降温。然而，在华尔街的投机边缘，冒险狂潮却与日俱增。【原文：The buy-everything mania that greeted Donald Trump’s election is cooling in the tried-and-tested world of stocks and corporate credit. Yet on Wall Street’s speculative fringes, the risk-taking frenzy is only getting bigger by the day.】
